nodes.text: Morel was a male Drall beast master residing on the Carrick Station during the Galactic War, a conflict fought between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire after their uneasy truce broke down.
Beastmaster Morel was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic in Update 4.0. as an NPC on the fleet, who starts a short mission while unlocking multiple creature companions from the Cartel Market.
